attributes.action: Give mental health more attention and improve services for mental health.
attributes.background: I suffer from anxiety and depression and have done since I was 19, I am now 21 years old and no matter how much i have reported to the doctor, counselling or any other service i have not been helped adaquetly and there is no help financially beneficial to help sufferers like myself with debt etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about mental health provision but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to improve services.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition about mental health provision for young adults. You might like to sign this petition if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251728
